item.title: Repository pattern vs. Specification pattern: Which is more maintainable?
item.description: When talking about Domain-Driven Design (DDD), the repository pattern becomes a default choice for the data access layer. Another pattern is the Specification pattern that organizes code into smaller objects. The question raised here is which suits your project and which is more maintainable as your project scales? I will Link to article: https://blog.elmah.io/repository-pattern-vs-specification-pattern-which-is-more-maintainable/
